exercise.title: Sum of Two Numbers

p.i: Can you use JavaScript to add two numbers together and write the sum into the browser console?

exercise.p: Define the following three variables: number1, number2, sum. Assign 3 to number1. Assign 4 to number2. After that, assign the sum of number1 and number2 to sum. Finally, write the value of sum into the browser console.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
